name: Glow Hockey
description:
Glow Hockey delivers a new style of hockey game. Easy to play, hard to master. Challenge yourself with your friend and the computer opponents!

FEATURES:
+ Local Wifi multiplayer
+ 2-player mode (on the same device).
+ 3 game slots in Championship mode.
+ 11 table themes.
+ 4 selectable paddles and pucks.
+ Landscape & Portrait view.
+ Multiple puck sizes (S, M, L).
+ Multi-puck (up to 10 pucks at the same time).
+ Rule settings for score and optionally with timeout.
+ Colorful glow graphics.
+ Smooth and responsive game play.
+ Realistic physics.
+ Quick play mode (single player), challenge yourself with 4 difficulty levels (Easy to Insane).
